SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Institute relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Nova Institute is {above} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total engineering graduates?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether University}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total engineering graduates?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Institute}.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1988, did the total Engineering Graduates experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total engineering graduates between 1980 and 1988 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1985, was the average total Engineering Graduates higher or lower than between 1980 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total engineering graduates between 1983 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1980 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1983, was the average total Engineering Graduates higher or lower than between 1982 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total engineering graduates between 1975 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Engineering Graduates in 1981 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total engineering graduates in 1981 was {lower} than in 1983.

MSR.A: {Aether University} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Echo Research, Nova Institute, Oracle Labs, Crimson Foundation, Starburst College, Luminara Academy, Aether University}.
